scene_description_enriched: Two bearded men, dressed in richly decorated robes and hats, are depicted in profile, facing each other. The man on the left wears a brown and gold robe and a blue hat. The man on the right wears a blue robe with gold trim and a gold and yellow striped hat. He is gesturing with his right hand, pointing his index finger upwards, while his left hand is held near his chest. The background is a vibrant pink with scattered gold leaf motifs. The figures are rendered with detailed facial features and flowing hair and beards. The scene is likely a depiction of a biblical or historical conversation, possibly involving figures of authority or wisdom.
